entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 4 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 along exposed areas of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
